mapper.insert: insert into tbl_class (class_num, class_nickname, class_title, class_category, class_place, class_price, class_start, class_end, class_approve, class_img, user_num) values(#{classNum}, #{classNickname}, #{classTitle}, #{classCategory}, #{classStart}, #{classEnd}, #{classApprove}, #{classImg}, #{userNum})
mapper.update: update tbl_class set class_nickname = #{classNickname}, class_title = #{classTitle}, class_category = #{classCategory}, class_start = #{classStart}, class_end = #{classEnd}, class_img = #{classImg} where class_num = {classNum}
update tbl_class set class_status = #{classStatus} where class_num = #{classNum}
update tbl_class set class_approve = #{classApprove} where class_num = #{classNum}
